widget.convert: {"template": [ MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (18, 5), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryText(pos = (90, 5), size = (650, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (100, 35), size = (650, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2, color=0x8A8787, color_sel=0x8A8787), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 58), size = (0, 0), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Roboto_HD", 22),gFont("Roboto_HD", 15)], "itemHeight": 65 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 1), size = (540, 28), font=0, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 0), # index 0 is the name MultiContentEntryText(pos = (5, 26), size = (540, 20), font=1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 2), # index 2 is the description MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (605, 2), size = (48, 48), png = 4), # index 4 is the status pixmap MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaTest(pos = (5, 50), size = (610, 2), png = 5), # index 4 is the div pixmap ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 22),gFont("Regular", 14)], "itemHeight": 52 }

{"template": [ MultiContentEntryText(pos = (130, 33), size = (15, 33), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_CENTER | RT_VALIGN_CENTER, text = 1), # Current Service MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 3), size = (525, 38), font = 1, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_TOP, text = 2), # Servicename MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 36), size = (525, 33), font = 2, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT | RT_VALIGN_CENTER | RT_WRAP, text = 3), # Eventname MultiContentEntryText(pos = (163, 69), size = (525, 32), font = 3, flags = RT_HALIGN_LEFT, text = 5), # Eventtime MultiContentEntryPixmapAlphaBlend(pos = (15, 14), size = (100, 67), png=6, flags = BT_SCALE) # picon ], "fonts": [gFont("Regular", 33), gFont("Regular", 30), gFont("Regular", 27), gFont("Regular", 24)], "itemHeight": 105 }
